Steps.Message: Update at 01:25 - Engineers have arrived back on site in the Barking Road area. At the moment we don't need to change the estimated timeframe. With darkness upon us we understand that it can be unsettling to have a power cut. It may help to locate a torch and anything else you may need so you can have it to hand just in case. If you have any concerns about this please do not hesitate to call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We will work to fix the problem as quickly and safely as possible

We became aware of a power cut at 20:13. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 01:25 - Engineers have arrived back on site in the Barking Road area. At the moment we don't need to change the estimated timeframe. With darkness upon us we understand that it can be unsettling to have a power cut. It may help to locate a torch and anything else you may need so you can have it to hand just in case. If you have any concerns about this please do not hesitate to call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We will work to fix the problem as quickly and safely as possible

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
